channel.title: Error connecting to server ( Please read )
channel.description: Hey, im tryna get a new server up... i can play on it when i use default "0.0.0.0" but when i change the server ip in client.java to my no-ip adress and compile it i get "error connecting to server" please help will be very appreciated:) Thanks

item.title: Error connecting to server ( Please read )
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

you are hosting it so you wouldn’t need to use your no-ip only need to use 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to server ( Please read )
item.dc:creator: @t7evious t7evious
item.description:
@t7evious wrote:

thankyou simba, i was thinking that but i couldnt get anyone to try it i’m gonna get someone now:)… and i have port forwarded correctly because i have had people on servers and havent changed a thing since

item.title: Error connecting to server ( Please read )
item.dc:creator: @Simba96 Simba96
item.description:
@Simba96 wrote:

from what your saying is you the host is trying to log on from the no-ip address , if so you cant only people who want to play your server use that IP and you use localhost , 0.0.0.0 / 127.0.0.1

Read full topic
